calculation_methodology.sentiment_calculation: Weighted average of VADER, TextBlob, and AFINN lexicon scores combined with transformer model outputs
calculation_methodology.confidence_basis: Based on agreement between VADER, TextBlob, AFINN, and RoBERTa (cardiffnlp/twitter-roberta-base-sentiment-latest)
calculation_methodology.source_weighting: Sources weighted by recency, domain authority, and retrieval relevance score
